sourcesContent:
import React, { Component } from 'react'

export class Form extends Component {
  render() {
    return (
      <form>
          <label htmlFor="">
            Name:
            <input type="text" />
          </label>

          <label htmlFor="">
            Email:
            <input type="email" />
          </label>

          <label htmlFor="">
            <textarea name="" id="" cols="30" rows="10"></textarea>
          </label>
          
          <select name="" id="">
            <option value="1">1</option>
            <option value="2">2</option>
            <option value="3">3</option>
          </select>
      </form>
    )
  }
}

export default Form
